entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Orillia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: E 30 km/h gust 43 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
